extendedInfo.description: Android Call Blocker application does exactly what its suppose to do - it blocks unwanted incoming calls. The application opens up with a very simple intuitive UI with following options  - View Blocked numbers  - View Blocked number call history  - Add from Contacts  - Add from Recent Calls  - Add new entry  - Enable CallBlocking Service (by default its enabled)Other available options From Settings tab  - Block All Incoming calls (may be you can use, if you really wanna take a power nap/deep sleep)  - Block Unknown/Private numbersFrom Blocked number list  - Edit existing number by clicking on the number  - Clicking menu'll show up other options like Add, Delete & Clear allIts a super simple application which does its job perfect.So if youâre thinking a smart way to escape from marketing calls, the right way to deal is to Install this application.Itâs a free app available and can be installed on any Android Device. This application is designed, developed and tested in US only.Note:If you set Call Divert option to Voicemail/Leave it Ringing it won't cost you/charge you. If you set Hangup the call option you will be charged (for a minute).Open/Known issues:-1. May not work on few LG modelsKeywords: CallBlocker, Call Blocker, call blocker, Filter, call filter, ring, ringtone, silent ringtone, do not disturb, dnd

reviews.title: My main issue is to unblock private numbers
reviews.comment: ok i have a htc wildfire and \"Bing\

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Razr..
reviews.comment: Added one number to hang up on....  They called and phone rang and forwarded to voicemail after no answer.  Program history shows no record of call.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works good on my G2 doesnt even ring on blocked #s however an option to delete blocked #s from call log and stealth mode would make this app 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Tried a few call blockers, this is the best. Clean crisp interface, does what it says very well. Free & no ads! Developer is responsive. Moto Spice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Am Queen
reviews.comment: I like it, its good but, when its on it turns your ringer off. If they fix that it will be great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If this keeps working like it has been, I\'ll keep it forever! Best call blocker on here! Great easy to use UI!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Selected the hangup option, but diverts calls to VM instead. Uninstalling. G2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on T Mobile G2
reviews.comment: It worked originally, but after recent \"updates\" it no longer blocks calls on the black list.  And, yes, I\'ve checked all the settings.  Too bad.
reviews.author: Craig Shields

reviews.comment: YOUSBAY I love this app (easy and simple) I wish I could put a widget to activate and deactivate and it from the desktop
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. Works as told. I\'ve bought several apps. Tried so much And this 1 is finally put to use!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work!!
reviews.comment: Have Atrix 4g, I have it set to hang up calls and it mutes the ring and lets it go to voicemail and ut is on my blacklist. Private calls do the thing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: It\'s ok, had numbers set so it hangs up, it answered the call instead.  Changed the setting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Gr8 appworks like it says. It needs a block all calls except option, then select from contacts the calls you will take. Otherwise perfect app. Love it

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: The restricted number I mainly got this app for got thru despite my \"hang up\" setting.  By by app.  Droid bionic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: does not work
reviews.comment: nexus gingerbread will silence and stop vibrate the phone only
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not block calls, even when set to hangup on settings and specific numbers it just mutes ringer, nothing more. EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome.
reviews.comment: it works fantastic and prevents those pesky anonymous calls from bothering me, especially from telemarketers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Samsung Gallaxy 3
reviews.comment: I used to have this on my G2 and it worked great. But I tried it on my Samsung and it doesn\'t work.  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Suzette Dauberger

reviews.comment: Can\'t believe it\'s free! I just wanted a free app to block all calls from time to time and this does the job perfectly! Thanks! Dell Streak in Germany
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app.
reviews.comment: Works pretty well. I have it set to \"hang up\" on blocked calls, & it does that. However,  two problems occur:  it doesn\'t \"hang up\" until after voicemail kicks in, so the blocked caller is able to hear my greeting & leave about a one second message! I don\'t like that at all. Other problem is as it blocks a call, it also silences my phone! So if I\'m not constantly checking my phone, I might miss a call I actually DO want! PLEASE FIX! This is a good app I\'d like to keep.
reviews.author: Pammy Chinnery
